mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jydp_coin_config_tab(recordNo, currencyId, currencyName, freeCurrencyNumber, minCurrencyNumber, ipAddress, backerId, backerAccount, configStatus, addTime) VALUES (#{recordNo}, #{currencyId}, #{currencyName}, #{freeCurrencyNumber}, #{minCurrencyNumber}, #{ipAddress}, #{backerId}, #{backerAccount}, #{configStatus}, #{addTime})
mapper.select: SELECT recordNo, currencyId, currencyName, freeCurrencyNumber, minCurrencyNumber, ipAddress, backerId, backerAccount, configStatus, addTime FROM jydp_coin_config_tab WHERE configStatus = 1 AND recordNo = #{recordNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE jydp_coin_config_tab SET configStatus = 2 WHERE recordNo = #{recordNo} AND configStatus = 1
mapper.select: SELECT NTB.userId, NTB.currencyNumber, CTB.currencyId, CTB.currencyName, CTB.freeCurrencyNumber, CTB.minCurrencyNumber FROM ( SELECT userId, currencyId, currencyNumber FROM user_currency_num_tab WHERE currencyId IN ( SELECT currencyId FROM transaction_currency_tab WHERE upStatus = 2 OR upStatus = 3 ) AND userId = #{userId} ) NTB JOIN (SELECT currencyId, currencyName, freeCurrencyNumber, minCurrencyNumber FROM( SELECT currencyId, currencyName, freeCurrencyNumber, minCurrencyNumber FROM jydp_coin_config_tab WHERE addTime <= NOW() AND configStatus = 1 GROUP BY currencyId, addTime ORDER BY addTime DESC ) JYDPCTB GROUP BY currencyId) CTB ON CTB.currencyId = NTB.currencyId

SELECT recordNo, currencyId, currencyName, freeCurrencyNumber, minCurrencyNumber, ipAddress, backerId, backerAccount, configStatus, addTime FROM jydp_coin_config_tab WHERE currencyId = #{currencyId} AND configStatus = 1 ORDER BY addTime DESC LIMIT 1
